languages.text: "Это утверждение истинно. Гибель, обещанная стагнацией, неизбежна. Гибель в ходе кризиса перемен — лишь вероятна. Покорное же ожидание предсказанной деградации позорно и является предательством Поиска знания". {n}Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

"This statement is true. The annihilation promised by stagnation is inevitable. Annihilation in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение истинно. Гибель, обещанная стагнацией, неизбежна. Гибель в ходе кризиса перемен — лишь вероятна. Покорное же ожидание предсказанной деградации позорно и является предательством Поиска знания". {n}Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. The downfall promised by stagnation is inevitable. A downfall in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

languages.text: 「この声明は真実である。低迷により約束された消滅は不可避である。変遷の危機における過程の消滅はあくまで推定である。そしておとなしく予告された破滅を待つのは恥ずべきことであり（聖なる）知識探求への裏切りである」{n}雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、代わりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The annihilation promised by stagnation is inevitable. Annihilation in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この声明は真実である。低迷により約束された破滅は不可避である。変遷の危機の過程の破滅はあくまで推定である。そしておとなしく予告された破滅を待つのは恥ずべきことであり（聖なる）知識探求への裏切りである」{n}雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、かわりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的，停滞只会带来不可避免的衰落。变革与危机可能确实会导致灭亡，但若是温顺地等待可以预见的衰落，这种做法既可耻，又背叛了求知远征的教义。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The annihilation promised by stagnation is inevitable. Annihilation in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的，停滞只会带来不可避免的衰落。变革与危机可能确实会导致灭亡，但若是温顺地等待可以预见的衰落，这种做法既可耻，又背叛了求知远征的教义。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Auslöschung durch Stagnation ist unvermeidlich. Die Auslöschung im Rahmen einer Krise durch Veränderung ist lediglich wahrscheinlich. Und auf den prophezeiten Niedergang einfach zu warten, ist eine Schande und bedeutet Verrat an der Suche nach Wissen." {n}Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The annihilation promised by stagnation is inevitable. Annihilation in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Der Untergang durch Stagnation ist unvermeidlich. Der Untergang bei einer Krise durch Veränderung ist lediglich wahrscheinlich. Und auf den prophezeiten Niedergang einfach zu warten, ist eine Schande und bedeutet Verrat an der Suche nach Wissen." {n}Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. L'annihilation promise par l'immobilisme est inévitable, alors qu'une annihilation dans le cadre d'une évolution critique est seulement probable. Or, attendre sans rien faire le déclin fatal est à la fois indigne et contraire à la Quête de la Connaissance. » {n}La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The annihilation promised by stagnation is inevitable. Annihilation in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. La chute promise par l'immobilisme est inévitable, alors qu'une chute dans le cadre d'une évolution critique est seulement probable. Or, attendre sans rien faire le déclin fatal est à la fois indigne et contraire à la quête de connaissance. » {n}La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}

languages.text: «Esa afirmación es cierta. La aniquilación propiciada por el estancamiento es sin duda inevitable. Una aniquilación en pleno transcurso de una crisis es meramente probable. Y aguardar con sumisión una caída vaticinada es deshonroso y constituye un acto de traición en la búsqueda del conocimiento». {n}El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The annihilation promised by stagnation is inevitable. Annihilation in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esa afirmación es cierta. El declive propiciado por el estancamiento es sin duda inevitable. Un declive en pleno transcurso de una crisis es meramente probable. Y aguardar con sumisión una caída vaticinada es deshonroso y constituye un acto de traición en la búsqueda del conocimiento». {n}El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Durağanlıktan kaynaklı yok oluş kaçınılmazdır. Değişim kaynaklı bir kriz sürecinde yok oluş ise yalnızca muhtemeldir. Öngörülen çöküşü uysalca beklemek utanç vericidir ve İrfan Arayışı'na ihanet etmek anlamına gelir." {n}O gürleyen derinlik Pasqal'ın voksundan kayboluyor, yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. The annihilation promised by stagnation is inevitable. Annihilation in the course of a crisis of change is merely probable. And meekly waiting for the foretold decline is shameful and constitutes a betrayal of the Quest for Knowledge." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

Öngörülen çöküşü uysalca beklemek utanç vericidir ve İrfan Arayışı'na ihanet etmek anlamına gelir." {n}O gürleyen derinlik Pasqal'ın voksundan kayboluyor, yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
